title: Own Up!
description: We all say things we regret, but will you own up to the things you've said online? When you see a quote appear, press your button if it's yours! Or don't... but then it might turn into a blame game!
players: Two to four users at a time. Scan your BioBracelets to join in. If you chicken out partway through, scan again, but it'll end it for everyone!
